title: S6 Jungle clears?
body:
Am I the only one who is getting smashed in the early clears and can't finish jungler item before like 15 mins or more?

Maybe I just had a bad game, but I seriously am going to get pissed off if Riot demolishes the jungle again this year...

replies.body: The jungle camps were made easier this patch lol. You were probably just having a bad game

actualy. {{champion:104}} can pretty much solo clear jungle now. funny story. his aa knock back monsters causing them not to aa for a bit.

by that time your 5th hit stun would be up and ready

I got creamed in jg with rango last night but i ran him with no masteries because of the reset. Will see how he goes tonight. But yeah tge clear felt very sluggish last night and new jg builds take much longer to create any real threat imho.

I have been in jg for a long time and can do a full clear on any champ with no leash you just need to be good at it and kite the camps make it so the big or littile monsters have to run around the other monsters to get you if you can do it you will take up to 50% less damage

Well i was able to sucessfully jungle as graves with no leash, but that maybe be related to graves being strong than the jungle being fine. I feel as though the new jungle should be alot easier, since all the camps got nerfed. If you happen to be playing a jungle that likes to do magic dmg or by the old purple jungle item then obviously the jungle will be tougher as you no longer have acess to the easy healing.
